00007   SimpleDynamicController::SimpleDynamicController(Intersection* i, SP38Simulation* sim, int cs) 
00008     : intersection(i), simulation(sim),  cycle_size(cs)   {
00009     new_cycle = true;
00010     total_phases =  i->phases.size();
00011     phase_lengths = std::vector < int > (total_phases,0);
00012     last_cycle_size = 0;
00013     last_cycle_started = 0;
00014   }
00015   
00016   void SimpleDynamicController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action, bool computeGrad) {   
00017     assert(action.size() == 1);
00018     int ct = simulation->getCurrentTime();    
00019 
00020 
00021     int current_phase_duration = simulation->getCurrentPhaseDuration(intersection);
00022     Phase* current_phase = simulation->getCurrentPhase(intersection);
00023     int icp = intersection->getPhaseIndex(current_phase);
00024 
00025     if(current_phase_duration < phase_lengths[icp]){
00026       action[0] = icp;
00027     }else{
00028       action[0] = ( icp + 1 ) % total_phases;
00029       // Back to the first phase? new cycle!
00030       new_cycle =  ( icp + 1 ) % total_phases == 0 && !simulation->isAnythingScheduled(intersection,ct);        
00031     }
00032 
00033 
00034     // Recalculate phase lenghts each new cycle
00035     if(new_cycle){
00036       new_cycle = false;
00037       last_cycle_size = ct - last_cycle_started;
00038       last_cycle_started = ct;
00039       cout << "DYNAMIC: Intersection " << intersection->getId() << " last cycle size " << last_cycle_size << " phase lenghts: ";
00040       // Getting the total throughput
00041       double tot_last_throughput = 0.0;
00042       for(int p=0; p < total_phases ; p++){
00043         double throughput = simulation->getPhaseMaxDetectorThroughputBetween(intersection, intersection->phases[p] , ct - last_cycle_size, ct);
00044         int total_detectors = intersection->phases[p]->getTotalDetectors();
00045         if(throughput == 0) throughput = 0.001;
00046         if(total_detectors == 0) total_detectors = 1;
00047         tot_last_throughput += throughput /* / (double)total_detectors */;
00048       }
00049       
00050       // Updating phase lenghts
00051       for(int p=0; p < total_phases ; p++){
00052         double throughput = simulation->getPhaseMaxDetectorThroughputBetween(intersection, intersection->phases[p] , ct - last_cycle_size, ct);
00053         int total_detectors = intersection->phases[p]->getTotalDetectors();
00054         if(throughput == 0) throughput = 0.001;         
00055         if(total_detectors == 0) total_detectors = 1;
00056         phase_lengths[p] = (int)ceil((double)cycle_size* ( ( throughput /* / (double)total_detectors */  ) / tot_last_throughput ));
00057         cout << phase_lengths[p] << " ";
00058       }
00059       cout << endl;
00060     }
00061 
00062   }
